ORIENT_RIGHT
Memory is mapped to the LCD from left to right.
Definition: mlcd.h:51
ORIENT_TOP
Memory is mapped to the LCD from top (y=0) to bottom.
Definition: mlcd.h:48
ORIENT_BOTTOM
Memory is mapped to the LCD from bottom (y=0) to top.
